Posts.Content: You are so brave, and an inspiration, to continue with this battle. I sincerely hope things begin to go well.
Posts.Title: Update on my reoccurence

Posts.Content: thank you so much, Roseann, for the positive news.
Posts.Title: Update on my reoccurence

Posts.Content: Yay! hopefully, we can all look forward to looking so good. i am 3 months post-chemo but still only have 1/2 inch growth. did you take anything to make it grow?
Posts.Title: This is me with 5 months of new hair.
